user.title: Configure Maintenance Component
user.description: Set up a component that requires periodic maintenance

data_description.name: How the component will be named in Home Assistant
data_description.last_maintenance: When the component was last serviced. If not specified, maintenance will be considered due now
data_description.device_id: Which device to link the component to. Can be left empty to create a standalone entity

get_overdue_items.name: Get Overdue Items
get_overdue_items.description: Returns a list of all components that require immediate maintenance

get_due_items.name: Get Due Items
get_due_items.description: Returns a list of all components that will need maintenance soon (within 7 days)

get_all_items.name: Get All Items
get_all_items.description: Returns a list of all components with their status
